Product Manager

InnovateCo • Austin, TX • Posted May 5, 2023
Technology
Compensation: $130,000 - $160,000 per year

Description

InnovateCo is seeking an experienced Product Manager to lead product development initiatives. You'll work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to define product strategy and roadmap. The ideal candidate has a track record of delivering successful products and strong analytical skills.

Contact Information

Email: pm.jobs@innovateco.com
